effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

flavorTexts.text:
The target is razed with a mystical fire of great
intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
